Part 5.question_text: With the help of one of the IT technicians, the missing accounting files have been _____.
A private reception for gallery donors will be _____ on March 5, prior to the grand opening of the exhibit.
Aurora Furnishings is finding it difficult to make a profit in its _____ competitive market.
A minor electrical malfunction was discovered by the pilot _____ before the plane took off.
We will make a final decision about changing the landscaping of the property after reviewing the _____ costs.
My Health Co. has produced a wide range of vitamin supplements for _____ two decades.
The April edition of Fishing and More magazine looks _____ different from previous issues because of the new art editor.
The customer's order _____ will be sent by e-mail within twenty-four hours.
The maintenance team's repair requests should be _____ in groups according to the urgency.
Following Ms. Rivera's _____ statement, the official awards ceremony for Plex Industries will commence.
Due to the high volume of foot traffic, the shop must polish its floors more _____ than usual during the peak season.
The Master Gardeners Club had to _____ its monthly meeting because the community center's conference room was double-booked.
Financial advisors report that older investors tend to be _____ than their younger counterparts.
Mr. Albrecht's _____ in replying to the HR director's e-mail demonstrated that he was highly interested in the position.
The soccer players usually practice on the main field at Waterbury Park, but they sometimes practice _____.
The accountants were unable to produce a full report by the deadline but promised that _____ would give a summary of the important points.
Despite having some problems with the sound system during the performance, the concert was an _____ experience for everyone.
_____ the building has an excellent location and a modern interior, it is popular among visitors.
The Parks and Recreation Department offers _____ opportunities for volunteers to improve the community.
The vacant rooms on the inn's second floor have _____ been cleaned.
The short story cannot be reprinted _____ explicit permission from the writer.
The restaurant has a _____ decorated room that is perfect for hosting children's parties.
A wildlife expert is scheduled to give a talk on the _____ that the factory has had on the surrounding forest.
The landlord raised the monthly rent for the first time in several years, and _____ so.
As long as there are no further delays, the factory will be fully _____ by June
Thanks to his experience, Mr. Warren is _____ capable of completing the job on his own.
Because of _____ fuel costs, some people are choosing to stay home for the summer vacation rather than drive to tourist sites.
The green light on the side of the water purifier lights up _____ the filter needs to be replaced.
Two items in Ms. Burke's order were out of stock, so her invoice was adjusted _____.
The notice indicated that a first-aid training course will be provided free of charge to _____ next month.

answers.A: If we get many suggestions, we could also hold a workshop on the following weekend, December 4th.

answers.D: Inviting friends and family to these events is always encouraged.
